```{r}
1. Describe **President Grant's personality** using only three words. 
2. Using your three words as headings, write 400 words to explain your reasoning. 
3. Write three things you did not know about President Grant before taking this class.
```{r bar type, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
Grant %>% 
  filter(Count > 4) %>% 
  arrange(Count) %>%
  mutate(Word = factor(Word, levels = unique(Word))) %>%
  ggplot(aes(Word, Count, fill = Word)) + 
  geom_col() + 
  coord_flip() +
  theme_minimal() +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Blues") +
  labs(title = "Words Students Used To Describe President Grant",
       x = " ",
       y = " ") +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_blank())
```
